import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon.component' import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown.component' import { setCartDropDown } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import './header.styles.scss' const Header = ({ currentUser }) => (
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ?
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN } this.props.visible ? setCartDropDown(false) : setCartDropDown(true)}/>
) const mapStateToProps = state => ({ currentUser: state.user.currentUser, visible: state.cart.visible }) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ setCartDropDown: visible => dispatch(setCartDropDown(visible)) }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Header);
